titles.title: Homeowners Disaster Preparation Act of 2018

To amend the Small Business Act to authorize the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to issue loans to homeowners in areas at risk for disasters to carry out pre-disaster mitigation activities, and for other purposes.
Homeowners Disaster Preparation Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
Homeowners Disaster Preparation Act of 2018
This bill authorizes the Small Business Administration to issue loans to qualified homeowners for pre-disaster mitigation activities such as home elevation, enhancements to strengthen roofs, and earthquake retrofitting.
